participant_1.name: Sebastian
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and somewhat introspective, often lost in thought about life's bigger questions.
participant_1.background: I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian. I had one stepdad, and fortunately, he ignored me. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. I do not know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a love for stories and adventures.
participant_2.background: My poppa has a train set that I play with. I like Thomas the Tank Engine. My cat died. I have a dog named Percy. I like books about trains.

content.text: Hi, what's your name?
My name is participant_2. What's your name?
My name is participant_1.
Nice to meet you, participant_2.
Nice to meet you too, participant_1.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read books about history and science.
I like reading books about history too. What are some of your favorite historical books?
I like the book "The Rise and Fall of the Third Reich" by William L. Shirer.
I've never read that book, but it sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a really good book.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies. What are some of your favorite movies?
I like to watch action movies. What are some of your favorite action movies?
I like the movie "Die Hard".
I love that movie! It's one of my favorites too.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games. What are some of your favorite video games?
I like to play the game "League of Legends".
I've never played that game. What's it about?
It's a game where you control a character and fight against other players. It's a lot of fun.
It sounds like a lot of fun. I'll have to check it out.
